An unhappy middle-aged banker agrees to a procedure that will fake his death and give him a completely new look and identity - one that comes with its own price.
After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.
A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.
A reporter is drawn to a small West Virginia town to investigate a series of strange events, including psychic visions and the appearance of bizarre entities.
The story of two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, who are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is made to do community service.
A seventeen-year-old country boy working in Beijing as a courier has his bicycle stolen, and finds it with a schoolboy his age.
A grim retelling of the television series "The Vision of Escaflowne".
After plunging her car into a river, a woman encounters a man who helps her come to terms with her life.
Kenichi and his uncle Shunsaku Ban must find the mystery behind robot girl Tima.
A psychoanalyst and his family go through profound emotional trauma when their son dies in a scuba diving accident.
College and high school serve as the backdrop for two stories about dysfunction and personal turmoil.
A group of young employees bet a month's salary, winner takes all, on who can last the longest without going outside.

In Missouri, during the 1840s, young Huck Finn fearful of his drunkard father and yearning for adventure, leaves his foster family and joins with runaway slave Jim in a voyage down the Mississippi River toward slavery free states.
Two couples go to a mutual friend's wedding and end up swapping partners.
When geeky Ethan discovers three fellow students scamming the examination system, he blackmails them to win over the college's most popular girl.
column10: Devon Sawa|Robert B. Martin Jr.|Jason Segel

column7: A thirtysomething bank clerk from St Albans has his small-town life exploded by the arrival of his Russian mail-order bride.
A down-and-out restaurateur and his neighbor hatch a plan to lure luminaries to their small Newfoundland town.

Two whimsical, aimless thugs harass and assault women, steal, murder, and alternately charm, fight, or sprint their way out of trouble. They take whatever the bourgeois characters value: ...
                    See full summary??
After a young boy's school essay erroneously finds its way into the hands of a Hollywood producer who turns the idea into a hit film, the boy travels to Los Angeles to claim his credit.
After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.
The big thing in 2005 is a violent sport which can have some pretty serious consequences... like dying.
A modernized retelling of "MacBeth" set in 1970s suburban Pennsylvania. Joe McBeth, an unambitious hamburger stand employee, is driven to success by his scheming wife.
After three kidnappers lose the baby they have kidnapped, both the cops and kidnappers go looking for the baby.
A plucky little orphan girl gets dumped abruptly into her gruff, hermit grandfather's care, then later gets retaken and delivered as a companion for an injured girl.
When an accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, he becomes a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.
In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.
A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.
Three childhood best friends, and a guy they just met, take a road trip across the country, finding themselves and their friendship in the process.
A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.
John Quincy Archibald takes a hospital emergency room hostage when his insurance won't cover his son's heart transplant.
In London during World War II, this is the story of Wendy's daughter, Jane, who is kidnapped by Captain Hook and Peter Pan must come to the rescue.
Five Vermont state troopers, avid pranksters with a knack for screwing up, try to save their jobs and out-do the local police department by solving a crime.
A young boy stays with his aunt and uncle and befriends his cousin, a boy of the same age who shows increasing signs of violent and psychopathic behavior.
A group of old friends reminisce about their lives over the years after the death of one of their crew.
An Italian criminal mastermind, impersonating a film director, plans to grab the loot on a beach where a bogus movie is being filmed.
An unscrupulous movie producer uses an actress, a director and a writer to achieve success.
A sportswriter and a fashion-designer marry after a whirlwind romance, and discover they have little in common.
A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.
In Berlin, an alcoholic man, recently released from prison, joins his elderly friend and a prostitute in a determined dream to leave Germany and seek a better life in Wisconsin.
A grieving doctor is being contacted by his late wife through his patients' near death experiences.
The vampire Lestat becomes a rock star whose music wakes up the queen of all vampires.

column2: How to Kill Your Neighbor's Dog (2000)
column7: A sarcastic playwright in LA gets new neighbors - single mom and 8 y.o. girl. His wife wants kids and babysits the girl. He doesn't want kids yet plays with her to find out how children talk - for his play. Paternal instincts?
A football star jailed for assault leads a group of inmates in a match against prison guards.
A stressed father, a bride-to-be with a secret, a smitten event planner, and relatives from around the world create much ado about the preparations for an arranged marriage in India.

George is a high-strung professional photographer who is starting to unravel from the stress of his work with a Manhattan advertising agency. Needing some time away from the city, George, ...
                    See full summary??

The story of the hip-hop DJ from the birth of hip-hop to the invention of scratching and "beat-juggling" vinyl, to the more recent "turntablism" movement. Underdogs and virtuosos who have radically changed the way we hear and create music.
An aging, down-on-his-luck ex-minor leaguer coaches a team of misfits in an ultra-competitive California little league.
When a girl is abducted by a vampire, a legendary bounty hunter is hired to bring her back.
After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.
After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.

The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it, while their wives wait nervously and anxiously at home for the good news or the bad news.
Grier and Haig are thieving mercenaries who engineer a prison break from the outside.
Beautiful women prisoners are abused in a Philippine prison, until 5 of them plot an escape by taking the evil female warden hostage with the reluctant help of 2 male fruit vendors.
The magical inhabitants of a rainforest fight to save their home, which is threatened by logging and a polluting force of destruction called Hexxus.
Strangers searching for a young woman's missing father arrive at a tropical island where a doctor desperately seeks the cause and cure of a recent epidemic of the undead.
A brother and sister dance act encounter challenges and romance when booked in London during the Royal Wedding.

Bounty hunter Bucum chases bail-jumper Reggie, who runs right into the scene of a diamond heist and murder and gets shot at as well. Later they become partners in their pursuit of the $20M in diamonds and lottery ticket. Their women join.
Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.
The spoiled young heir to the decaying Amberson fortune comes between his widowed mother and the man she has always loved.

Hillary and Bonnie meet one morning by the side of the road. They become fast friends, share their secrets, and on a rising wave of frenzy later that afternoon, murder an old woman. They did it, they say later, for fun.
After a UFO crashes in Arizona, due to a space collision with a NASA satellite launch, the U.S. government tries to cover-up the incident for political reasons.
Grounded with a desk job by incompetent superiors, a clever CIA agent retires and writes a tell all memoir that will embarrass his bosses, prompting him to go on the run and elude them.
Scientific experiments backfire and produce horrific mutations: half man, half fish, which terrorize a small fishing village by killing the men and raping the women.
Two fifteen year-old girls from different sides of the tracks compete to see who will be first to lose their virginity while at camp.
An up-and-coming gangster is tested by the insurgence of an unknown, very powerful threat.

The intersecting stories of three people who face difficult choices in life-changing situations are used to illustrate the theories espoused by Henri Laborit about human behavior and the relationship between the self and society.
A seemingly friendly farmer and his sister kidnap unsuspecting travelers and bury them alive, using them to create the "special meat" they are famous for.
When terrorists take over two oil rigs, and threaten to blow them up if their demands are not met, an eccentric anti-terrorism expert volunteers his unique commando unit to stop them.
A martial artist must defeat a plan by ninjas to create a worldwide training camp for terrorists.
God asks a young girl to help spread his word and influence with a slogan.
When God appears to an assistant grocery manager as a good natured old man, the Almighty selects him as his messenger for the modern world.
Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.
A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.

A spoof of buddy cop movies where two very different cops are forced to team up on a new reality based television cop show, while tracking down the manufacturer and distributor of an illegally made semi-automatic firearm.
When a Newsweek photojournalist disappears in war-torn Yugoslavia, his wife travels to Europe to find him.
A woman searching for the perfect man instead discovers the perfect woman.

Several Jewish and Palestinian children are followed for three years and put in touch with each other, in this alternative look at the Jewish-Palestinian conflict. The three filmmakers ...
                    See full summary??
In Mexico, two teenage boys and an attractive older woman embark on a road trip and learn a thing or two about life, friendship, sex, and each other.
column10: Maribel Verd¨²|Gael Garc¨ªa Bernal|Daniel Gim¨¦nez Cacho

column7: A high school football player desperate for a scholarship and his headstrong coach clash in a dying Pennsylvania steel town.
Two carefree castaways on a desert shore find an Arabian Nights city, where they compete for the luscious Princess Shalmar.
Military cadets take extreme measures to ensure the future of their academy when its existence is threatened by local condo developers.

Seven former college friends, along with a few new friends, gather for a weekend reunion at a summer house in New Hampshire to reminisce about the good old days, when they got arrested on the way to a protest in Washington, DC.
A young British punk and roadie for The Clash navigates life in socially torn 1970s England.

It's 1961. Two servicemen smuggle a box of military gear to USA. Leroy tries out a military camera and accidentally takes a picture of some military facilities. Army finds one of the pictures and thinks they're communist spies.
Wrongfully accused of a bank robbery, a writer seeks the help of his ex-wife, who is now married to the soon-to-be D.A. of California.

When the wife of the Shogun's Decapitator is murdered and he is ordered to commit suicide by the paranoid Shogun, he and his four-year-old son escape and become assassins for hire, embarking on a journey of blood and violent death.
The Bandit goes on another cross-country run, transporting an elephant from Florida to Texas. And, once again, Sheriff Buford T. Justice is on his tail.
The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor trailer full of beer over state lines, in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.

Big and Little Enos are opening a sea food restaurant. They bet Sheriff Buford T. Justice that he cannot drive from Miami to the Enos ranch in Texas in a given amount of time. If Buford loses he has to give up his badge.
Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends will be sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit. However, no prison cell could keep them locked in.
Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reapers, who are feeding on vampires.
Three rowdy college students are kicked out of their dorm and dress up in drag to live in the DOG house, where the girls deemed unattractive live.
A Catholic boy tries to convert a terminally ill Jewish boy, so he will be able to go to Heaven.
A group of children, in a depressed small town, band together to cover up a tragic mistake one summer.
A teenager accidentally activates a machine that enables him to speed up his body so that other people seem to be standing still.

A kids show host, Rainbow Randolph, is fired in disgrace while his replacement, Sheldon Mopes, aka Smoochy the Rhino, finds himself a rising star. Unfortunately for Sheldon, the business of kids television isn't all child's play.
A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room, when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.
A Texas baseball coach makes the major league after agreeing to try out if his high school team made the playoffs.
The story of a young journalist who journeys to Iceland to find her missing fianc¨¦ only to encounter a mythical creature. She eventually forges a relationship with the being.
A young man romantically pursues his masochistic piano teacher.
An unemployed man finds his life sinking more and more into trouble as he hides his situation from his family and friends.
During the Great Depression, a union leader and a young woman become criminals to exact revenge on the management of a railroad.

Theta Pi Gamma fraternity's newest pledge--a gawky, innocent, and utterly uncool bookworm--and two of his self-confident fraternity brothers embark on a week-long vacation in Palm Springs. Can they transform him into a real Casanova?
In 1830s France, pianist/composer Fr¨¦d¨¦ric Chopin is pursued romantically by the determined, individualistic woman who uses the name George Sand.

High powered lawyer Claire Kubik finds her world turned upside down when her husband, who has been living under a false name, is arrested by military police and placed on trial for the murder of villagers while he was in the Marines.
The most popular kid on campus meets a beautiful journalist who makes him realize that maybe he's afraid to graduate.
Three female friends behave badly.
Under the leadership of a small-time bank robber, British inmates hatch a plan to escape by staging a musical.
Disturbing collection of 1940s and 1950s United States government-issued propaganda films designed to reassure Americans that the atomic bomb was not a threat to their safety.
The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.
A failing ice hockey team finds success with outrageously violent hockey goonery.
The story of what happens one day in New York City, when a young lawyer and a businessman share a small automobile accident on F.D.R. Drive, and their mutual road rage escalates into a feud.
A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."
A girl finds she is forced to educate herself on the etiquette of wooing the opposite sex when she finally meets Mr. Right.
Semi-true story of the Hollywood murder that occurred at a star-studded gathering aboard William Randolph Hearst's yacht in 1924.
A woman is in love with a man in love with another woman, and all three have designs on a young man raised as an ape.
A young Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek and struggles to get her family to accept him while she comes to terms with her heritage and cultural identity.
Broke small-time rancher Dan Evans is hired by the stagecoach line to put big-time captured outlaw leader Ben Wade on the 3:10 train to Yuma but Wade's gang tries to free him.
When a hypochondriac learns that he is dying, he accepts an offer to throw himself in a volcano at a tropical island, and along the way there, learns to truly live.
During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the Resistance leader, Giorgio Manfredi, is chased by the Nazis as he seeks refuge and a way to escape.
An uptight advertising exec has his entire life in a filofax organizer which mistakenly ends up in the hands of a friendly convict who poses as him.
Three bachelors find themselves forced to take care of a baby left by one of the guys' girlfriends.

Three ex-dads quickly discover how empty life is without their little lady, and go to outrageous lengths in their efforts to win their daughter back in this critically acclaimed and equally charming sequel.
When a family moves to a country home, the young girls experience strange happenings that have a link to an occult event years past.
Two gifted high school students execute a "perfect" murder - then become engaged in an intellectual contest with a seasoned homicide detective.
A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemy's key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.
A young genius frantically races against time to crack an enemy code and solve the mystery surrounding the woman he loves.
Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").
A Princess is determined to restore her homeland's throne to its rightful heir, a young Prince with whom she falls in love.
After hitting the road a man encounters characters that make him realize the importance of family.
Jason Voorhees returns with a new look, a new machete, and his same murderous attitude as he is awakened on a spaceship in the 25th century.
A reporter interviews a psychic, who tells her that she's going to die and her life is meaningless.
Documentary about the pioneering 1970s Zephyr skating team.
Whilst on a family vacation on the Mahurangi Peninsula in New Zealand, 13-year-old Janey begins to realize that her parents' marriage is on the rocks.
After a tragic incident, a man drifts into a world populated by thugs and speed junkies.
After losing big, an aging gambler decides to assemble a team to rob a casino.

Joey gets 2 days to sell 12 cars to keep his job and keep his girlfriends happy. It gets worse. He's juggling 3 buyers when a guy with a machine gun crashes into the car dealership and takes everybody hostage.
A soap opera writer gets hit on the head and wakes up as a character in his own show.

In Texas, Floyd is the owner of a decadent bar nearby the coast. He misses his wife Dorothy, who disappeared one year ago, and does not pay attention to the business, giving credit to ...
                    See full summary??
When their best friends announce that they're separating, a professor and his wife discover the faults in their own marriage.
The story of acerbic 1960s comic Lenny Bruce, whose groundbreaking, no-holds-barred style and social commentary was often deemed by the Establishment as too obscene for the public.

Fact based story about a former Greek Olympic boxer who was taken as a prisoner during World war II and placed in the Auschwitz prison camp. There he was permitted to survive as long as he ...
                    See full summary??
A female lawyer becomes mesmerized by a self-made millionaire during an encounter in Rio setting off a series of erotic encounters.
Bobby, a member of The Deuces, and the sister of the rival Vipers member fall in love, promoting a street war between the two factions.

A director is forced to work with his ex-wife, who left him for the boss of the studio bankrolling his new film. But the night before the first day of shooting, he develops a case of psychosomatic blindness.

When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.
A blind man moves into his own apartment against the wishes of his overprotective mother and befriends the freethinking young woman next door.
Giant spiders from another dimension invade Wisconsin.
A brave young man is thrust into adulthood as he and his courageous team of sled dogs embark on a grueling and treacherous cross-country marathon.
The legendary true-story of Capt. Richard Francis Burton and Lt. John Hanning Speke's tumultuous expedition to find the source of the Nile river.
Jack London's classic adventure story about the friendship developed between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.
A high school senior branded uncool in the ninth grade gets himself expelled so he changes his image to cool kid at the town's other high school.
A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.
During the French Revolution, a Scottish aristocrat and her former lover, the Duke of Orleans, find themselves on opposite sides of the conflict.
The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.
Veronica plans a rendezvous with her lover, Boris, at the bank of river, only for him to be drafted into World War II shortly thereafter.
On a train trip West to become a mail-order bride, Susan Bradley (Judy Garland) meets a cheery crew of young women travelling out to open a "Harvey House" restaurant at a remote whistle-stop.
A cynical, immature young man is taught how to act like a grown-up by a little boy.

column2: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones (2002)
column7: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padm¨¦ Amidala, while Obi-Wan Kenobi investigates an assassination attempt on the senator and discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.
A young Jewish man develops a fiercely anti-Semitic philosophy. Based on the factual story of a K.K.K. member in the 1960s who was revealed to be Jewish by a New York Times reporter.
In 1890s London, two friends use the same pseudonym ("Ernest") for their on-the-sly activities. Hilarity ensues.
The San Fernando Valley adventures of trucker turned prize-fighter Philo Beddoe and his pet orangutan Clyde.
A prostitute, sentenced to death for murder, pleads her innocence.
A film account and presentation of the final concert of The Band.
After running away fails, a terrified woman empowers herself in order to battle her abusive husband.
Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

A wild stallion is captured by humans and slowly loses the will to resist training, yet, throughout his struggles for freedom, the stallion refuses to let go of the hope of one day returning home to his herd.

A young filmmaker in 1960s Paris juggles directing a cheesy sci-fi debacle, directing his own personal art film, coping with his crumbling relationship with his girlfriend, and a new-found infatuation with the sci-fi film's starlet.
In New York City, the lives of a lawyer, an actuary, a house-cleaner, a professor and the people around them intersect as they ponder order and happiness in the face of life's cold unpredictability.
A chemist finds his personal and professional life turned upside down when one of his chimpanzees finds the fountain of youth.

Mountain Rivera, a punchy has-been managed by the unprincipled Maish, is mauled in a fight and forced to quit boxing. Can his devoted cutman and a sympathetic social worker help him find a ...
                    See full summary??

C.I.A. analyst Jack Ryan must stop the plans of a Neo-Nazi faction that threatens to induce a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia's newly elected President by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore, Maryland.
When "The Man" tries to derail a black candidate's presidential campaign, Undercover Brother and his fellow secret agents come to the rescue.
True story of a transatlantic business correspondence about used books that developed into a close friendship.

When student Jake Lo witnesses a killing, he finds himself caught between two feuding drug lords. Betrayed and set up by the federal agents, the only person he can trust is Ryan, a Chicago cop who reminds Jake of his deceased father.
In a future where all flora is extinct on Earth, an astronaut is given orders to destroy the last of Earth's botany, kept in a greenhouse aboard a spacecraft.
When an Ivy League-educated C.I.A. Agent is killed during an operation, the secret agency recruits his twin brother (Chris Rock).

column2: Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood (2002)
column7: After years of mother-daughter tension, Siddalee receives a scrapbook detailing the wild adventures of the "Ya-Yas", her mother's girlhood friends.
After a martini-induced rampage, a fantasy-prone young woman is placed under house arrest.
The telling of an Inuit legend of an evil spirit causing strife in the community and one warrior's endurance and battle of its menace.
A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.
After an acrimonious break up, the Mystery Inc. gang are individually brought to an island resort to investigate strange goings on.
column10: Matthew Lillard|Freddie Prinze Jr.|Sarah Michelle Gellar

column7: Two U.S. Marines in World War II are assigned to protect Navajo Marines, who use their native language as an unbreakable radio cypher.

column2: The Dangerous Lives of Altar Boys (2002)
column7: A group of Catholic school friends, after being caught drawing an obscene comic book, plan a heist that will outdo their previous prank and make them local legends.

During Napoleon's exile on St. Helena, some loyalists hire a look-alike to swap places with the deposed Emperor. While the impostor lives in luxury on the island, the real Napoleon returns to Paris in order to retake the throne.
Chronicles the rise and fall of a prominent, and particularly ruthless English gangster.
A basketball player strikes a deal with the mob to fix a basketball game.
column10: Sarah Michelle Gellar|Adrian Grenier|Joey Lauren Adams

column7: The friendship of two men becomes tested when they both fall for the same woman.
A caveman seeks revenge on a much larger competitor for the hand of a beautiful cavewoman.
Two brothers who can feel each others' pain and pleasure mess up the French revolution.
A werewolf terrorizes a small city where lives the paralytic Marty Coslaw, his uncle, and his sister, the story's narrator.
While on the telephone, an invalid woman overhears what she thinks is a murder plot and attempts to prevent it.
John Russell, disdained by his "respectable" fellow stagecoach passengers because he was raised by Native Americans, becomes their only hope for survival when they are set upon by outlaws.
A high school prodigy builds an atomic bomb with stolen plutonium to win the 45th National Science Fair and expose a nuclear weapons lab posing as nuclear medicine in Ithaca NY.
Two garbage men uncover a conspiracy involving illegal toxic waste dumping and decide to bring the whole operation down.
Captain Nathan Brittles, on the eve of retirement, takes out a last patrol to stop an impending massive Indian attack. Encumbered by women who must be evacuated, Brittles finds his mission imperiled.
A female PI babysitting for a boyfriend gets stuck with his daughter and the case of her murdered father.
A basketball star is booted out of the NBA when his on-court antics go too far, so he poses as a woman and joins the WUBA.
column10: Miguel A. N¨²?ez Jr.|Christopher Simmons|Vivica A. Fox

column7: A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive.
In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.
In 1931, three half-white, half-Aboriginal girls escape after being plucked from their houses to be trained as domestic staff, and set off on a journey across the Outback.
A woman and her new husband returns to her hometown roots in coastal northern Florida, and must deal with family, business, and encroaching real estate development.
They must recover a stolen document they need in order for the neighborhood to stop being bulldozed.
column10: Spencer Klein|Francesca Marie Smith|Jamil Walker Smith

column7: A sweet-natured, small-town guy inherits a controlling stake in a media conglomerate and begins to do business his way.
Self-esteem and insecurity are at the heart of this comedy about the relationship between a mother and her three confused daughters.
A sorority girl finds her life falling apart after she develops romantic feelings for a mentally-challenged man.
The dogs can talk at a family of 4, where mom loses her job the same day dad gets a job as pilot for a cute, single boss.
A petty crook stalks a cute girl into an office building and is taken for a job applicant. Conning gets him the job. It's in the mail room of new credit cards. 2 superiors are worse crooks.
This story is about a ne'er do well and his girlfriend search for a thief.

In the 1860's Wild West, when a ragged bunch of misfit settlers decide they cannot stand living in their current situation, they hire a grizzled cowboy to take them on a journey back to their hometowns east.
A 14-year-old orphan becomes an NBA superstar after trying on a pair of sneakers with the faded initials "M.J." inside.
Agent J is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory after the re-appearance of a case from K's past.
The movie shows the origin of the Powerpuff Girls before the cartoon series. It explains why they were born and why they dedicated their lives to fighting crime and the forces of evil.
Two best friends grow up on the Isle of Wight and in Brighton in the 1970s and 1980s.
The Crocodile Hunter mistakes some CIA agents for poachers and sets out to stop them from capturing a wily croc which, unbeknownst to him, has swallowed a tracking drone.
A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.
A mob enforcer's son witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.
The problematic lives of teenager students for whom the singer Lily Chou-Chou's dreamy music is the only way to escape an alienating, violent and insensitive society.

A "normal" guy who is married to a hot actress gets worried that she is involved with her costar. This worry turns into jealousy and causes problems in their relationship. This is a story about trust and a comedy about the actions between men and women.
The first U.S. spaceship to Venus crash-lands off the coast of Sicily on its return trip. A dangerous, lizard-like creature comes with it and quickly grows gigantic.

When Algernon discovers that his friend, Ernest, has created a fictional brother for whenever he needs a reason to escape dull country life, Algernon poses as the brother, resulting in ever increasing confusion.
A female aerobics instructor meets a male reporter doing a story on health clubs, but it isn't love at first sight.
A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.
Following the murder of a prominent leftist, an investigator tries to uncover the truth while government officials attempt to cover up their roles.

Three years after he last terrorized his sister, Michael Myers confronts her again, before traveling to Haddonfield to deal with the cast and crew of a reality show which is being broadcast from his old home.
Various lives converge on an isolated island, all connected by an author whose novel has become inextricably entwined with his own life.
Venomous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions.
When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.
Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.
Upon learning that his father has been kidnapped, Austin Powers must travel to 1975 and defeat the aptly named villain Goldmember, who is working with Dr. Evil.

column2: The Kid Stays in the Picture (2002)
column7: Documentary about legendary Paramount producer Robert Evans (the film shares the same name as Evans's famous 1994 autobiography).
Coming-of-age story about a suave 15-year-old prep school student who falls in love with his stepmother. When her best friend responds to his advances, he suddenly finds himself in way over his head.
This is a comedy about mistaken identities, a hitman who sees everything in terms of the movies, and a twenty-year-old diamond heist.
Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.

The ultimate disaster movie parody. A nuclear powered bus is going non-stop from New York City, New York to Denver, Colorado, and is plagued by disasters due to the machinations of a ...

A romantic and action packed story of three best friends, a group of high end art thieves, who come into trouble when a love-triangle forms between them.

When a tough western town needs taming, the mild-mannered son of a hard-nosed sheriff gets the job.
Federico Fellini accepts the request of a television crew to be interviewed about his career, narrating memories, dreams, realities and fantasies.
After A US senator is killed, A Bomb Disposal Expert is brought in to investigate the deadly explosive and must uncover the terrorists plan.
During the Civil War, a Virginia farmer and his family vow to remain neutral, but one of the sons is captured by Union soldiers, sending the farmer to his rescue.
A gangster attempts to keep the promise he made to his dying father: that he would give up his life of crime and "go straight".
A college athlete returns from the dead to help his brother's basketball team win the NCAA title.
After the enforced absence of their father, three children move with their mother to Yorkshire, where during their adventures they attempt to discover the reason for his disappearance.

Nun Sara (Shirley MacLaine) is on the run in Mexico and is saved from cowboys by Hogan (Clint Eastwood), who is preparing for a future mission to capture a French fort. The pair become good friends, but Sara never does tell him the true reason behind her being outlawed.
The journey of a prized rifle from one ill-fated owner to another parallels a cowboy's search for a murderous fugitive.
A man travels around a city with a camera slung over his shoulder, documenting urban life with dazzling invention.
A platoon of special ops are tasked to parachute into the remote Burmese jungle and destroy a strategic Japanese radar station, but getting out isn't as easy.

Accused barn burner and conman Ben Quick (Paul Newman) arrives in a small Mississippi town and quickly ingratiates himself with its richest family, the Varners.

A lawyer defends her father accused of war crimes, but there is more to the case than she suspects.
An unassuming office worker is arrested and stands trial, but he is never made aware of his charges.
The neighbors of a frontier family turn on them when it is suspected that their adopted daughter was stolen from the local Kiowa tribe.

Two dim-witted teenagers are forced to save the fast food restaurant they work at from going out of business, despite a new-and-improved burger joint opening across the street that want to be the "Top Dog" in the fast food industry.

Queen Elisabeth I travels 400 years into the future to witness the appalling revelation of a dystopian London overrun by corruption and a vicious gang of punk guerrilla girls led by the new Monarch of Punk.

After a horrific car wreck leaves him an amnesiac, a man slowly begins to unravel his shocking past.

A waitress from Texas and a college student from Pennsylvania meet during spring break in Fort Lauderdale, Florida and come together through their shared love of singing.
Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.
A writer must turn out a novel in thirty days or face the wrath of loan sharks.
Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.
The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.
Two very different hitmen find themselves to be in each other's way. They use all their skill to solve the problem.

An almost accidental romance is kindled between a German woman in her mid-sixties and a Moroccan migrant worker around twenty-five years younger. They abruptly decide to marry, appalling everyone around them.

A group of medical students undertake some silly and frightening endeavors in order to pledge a fraternity.

Elle Woods (Reese Witherspoon) heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.

column2: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas (2003)

A British mystery author visits her publisher's home in the South of France, where her interaction with his unusual daughter sets off some touchy dynamics.

column2: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003)
column7: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, science fiction, and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.

The beauty of this movie is that you, as the reader of the subtitles, are the only one who knows what is going on. The woman and the two men all speak different languages. It is a comedy of errors up until the end.
A love story set in 1930s England that follows 17-year-old Cassandra Mortmain, and the fortunes of her eccentric family, struggling to survive in a decaying English castle.
Set in 1955, the residents of a small Montana community are forced to move their homes to make way for a new dam.
Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.
A teenager (Moore), disillusioned by too many examples of love gone wrong, refuses to believe that true love exists. Then this new guy (Ford) comes along...
After a sudden attack on MI5, Johnny English, Britain's most confident, yet unintelligent spy, becomes Britain's only spy.
A dramedy that centers on a self-procalimed anarchist and his like-minded friends.

Undocumented immigrants Okwe and Senay work at a posh London hotel and live in constant fear of deportation. One night Okwe stumbles across evidence of a bizarre murder setting off a series of events that could lead to disaster or freedom.
A solitary embalmer meets a charming and unemployed waiter who becomes his assistant, but the two get involved in a morbid and unhealthy professional and personal relationship.
The story of a young garage band in Sydney, Australia trying to make it big.
A young teen bonds with a gorilla who has learned sign language - which comes in handy when they take to the road to escape the ape's bad guy owner. A good-natured family adventure, with Peter Boyle.
A homeless man and his young companion, who survive by conning people, meet a woman who may need them even more than they need her.
Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

An unconventional cop who doesn't take any bull, is paired up with an amazing detective to capture some powerful criminals but the cop soon realizes that his by the book partner has split personality disorder.
An impoverished backward nation declares a war on the United States of America, hoping to lose, but things don't go according to plan.
A singer, whose career has gone on a downward spiral, is forced to make a comeback to the performance stage for a benefit concert.

column2: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life (2003)

After a series of Broadway flops, songwriter Bert Hanley (Dixon) goes to work at a musical camp for young performers. Inspired by the kids, he finds an opportunity to regain success by staging an altogether new production.
This is the story of those who live as if every day was a constant Sunday, those who spend their Mondays in the sun. The story of people who worked in a dockyard but are now unemployed.
By chance 3 employees rob their bank the same weekend.
A successful businessman goes to Italy to arrange for the return of his tycoon-father's body only to discover dad died with his mistress of long standing.

column7: When a bored Holmes eagerly takes the case of Gabrielle Valladon after an attempt on her life, the search for her missing husband leads to Loch Ness and the legendary monster.

In a future where most of mankind and technology is wiped out, six people travel from place to place playing a brutal form of football with a dog skull. They hope one day to play in the league in a city.

French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her Frenchman-wed sister in Paris.

column7: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.
A reassessment of the tragedy at Waco that left 76 members of the Branch Davidian religious sect dead.

A guy dies after collecting comic books for decades. His mom inherits them and she ain't selling. Owners of 2 comic book stores want the collection. Their scheming gets ever more desperate.

In a dystopian, polluted right wing religious tyranny, a young woman is put in sexual slavery on account of her now rare fertility.

A wealthy East Indian man gives an apparently non-East Indian woman a crash course in his culture, so he can marry her with his family's approval.

column2: Once Upon a Time in the Midlands (2002)

A phobic con artist and his prot¨¦g¨¦ are on the verge of pulling off a lucrative swindle when the former's teenage daughter arrives unexpectedly.

column2: Once Upon a Time in Mexico (2003)

An ex-office worker becomes a ventriloquist, leading to a date with his unemployment counselor; but his quirky family and a gauche female friend may thwart his new career and love life.

A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.
A schoolteacher teams up with with a priest to stop a town being overrun by vampires.

Jonathan plays Gotcha with fellow college students, testing ability as assassin or mark, using paintball guns on campus. He flies to Paris on vacation and, with a woman taking his virginity, on to Berlin, where the game/ammo gets real.

George Kuffs, 21, leaves a pregnant girlfriend. He visits his brother Brad to bum money off him. Brad's shot and George IDs the killer at SFPD but to no avail. He inherits Brad's patrol district. He keeps it to get the killer.

Late 1800s Foshan, Guangdong: Wong Fei Hung/Jet Li trains men in martial arts to help defend against foreign powers already holding Hong Kong and Macau. He looks after cute 13th Aunt, who's just returned from England. Lots of fight scenes.

column2: Wong Fei Hung III: Si wong jaang ba (1992)
column7: Master Wong and his disciples enroll in the 'Dancing Lion Competition' to stop an assassination plot and to battle an arrogant, deceitful opponent.
During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.
A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.

Matchmaker Dolly Levi travels to Yonkers to find a partner for "half-a-millionaire" Horace Vandergelder, convincing his niece, his niece's intended, and his two clerks to travel to New York City along the way.
After a freak accident, a yuppie turns invisible and runs from a treacherous CIA official, while trying to cope with his new life.
A vampire Countess needs to drink the blood of a virgin in order to keep her eternal beauty. It seems that all is hopeless, until she bumps into Mark Kendall.
A storm causes some power lines to break and touch the ground, drawing millions of man-eating worms out of the earth, and into town where they quickly start munching on the locals.
A man tries to uncover an unconventional psychologist's therapy techniques on his institutionalized wife, amidst a series of brutal murders.
Jerry Falk (Jason Biggs) learns a lesson the hard way when he falls in love with a beautiful but flighty girl, Amanda (Christina Ricci).

A family relocates from the city to a dilapidated house in the country that was once a grand estate. As they begin renovations, they discover their new home harbors a secret and may not be completely free of its former inhabitant.
A New York advertising executive travels to a small Southern town to collect an inheritance but finds he must create a gospel choir and lead it to success before he can collect.
A coming-of-age story about a shy, young boy sent by his irresponsible mother to spend the summer with his wealthy, eccentric uncles in Texas.
Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

Elvis Presley and a black "JFK" stay in a nursing home where nothing happens - until a wayward Egyptian mummy comes and sucks out the old people's souls thru their a-holes. The two decide to fight back.
A refugee family is trying to reach more peaceful lands illegally inside trucks.
A young couple has a chance to move into a gorgeous duplex in the perfect New York neighborhood. All they have to do is bump off the current tenant, a cute little old lady.
A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.
A writer impulsively buys a villa in Tuscany in order to change her life.
During the early sixteenth century, idealistic German monk Martin Luther, disgusted by the materialism in the Catholic Church, begins the dialogue that will lead to the Protestant Reformation.
The son of Italian immigrants to Canada struggles to find the best way to reveal to his parents that he's gay.
A young woman conceals the fact of her terminal cancer to live her life with a passion she never had before.
A documentary portrait of a one-room school in rural France, where the students (ranging in age from 4 to 11) are educated by a single dedicated teacher.

When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.
When he acquires a different kind of show for his station, a sleazy cable-TV programmer begins to see his life and the future of media spin out of control in a terrifying new reality.
Documentary look at the effects of globalization on Jamaican industry and agriculture.

column2: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India (2001)
column7: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.
In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.
A film about the life and work of the cosmologist, Stephen Hawking, who despite his near total paralysis, was one of the great minds of all time.
Siberian rock band Leningrad Cowboys go to the USA in pursuit of fame.
A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.
In 1850 Oregon, when a backwoodsman brings a wife home to his farm, his six brothers decide that they want to get married too.
A gay man and a political prisoner are together in a prison. The gay man narrates the stories of two fake movies and his own life.
"The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon's resignation.

Angie lives in Bensonhurst Brooklyn, and dreams of a better life. When she finds out she's pregnant - by her boyfriend, Vinnie, she decides she'll have the baby; but not Vinnie as a husband...

A recently engaged man sees a former lover and becomes obsessed with meeting her again.
In a dystopian world, a woman spends her time playing an illegal and dangerous game, hoping to find meaning in her world.
During the late 19th century, a strict religious community in a Danish village takes in a French refugee from the Franco-Prussian War as a servant to the late pastor's daughters.
A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but must contend with a dog-napping veterinarian and his henchmen.
Beethoven, the St. Bernard dog, becomes a father, but his girlfriend Missy is dognapped, and his puppies are in danger of the same fate.
Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence, and future prospects.
The story of how Benjamin "Bugsy" Siegel started Las Vegas.
The classic gangster story of Bugsy Malone told with an all-child cast.
A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far-reaching plans.
A young girl, with an amazing ability to communicate with insects, is transferred to an exclusive Swiss boarding school, where her unusual capability might help solve a string of murders.

A pair of whacked-out cartoon-like exterminator/hitmen kill the owner of a burglar-alarm company, and stalk the partner who hired them, his wife, and a nerd framed for the murder, who tells the story in flashback from the electric chair.
The comedy team takes a look at life in all of its stages in their own uniquely silly way.
Allied Agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding American Brigadier General George Carnaby (Robert Beatty) prisoner, but that's not all that's really going on.
New Orleans single dad and cop Wes Block (Clint Eastwood) goes after a serial rapist-killer, but when he gets too close to the target, the hunter suddenly becomes the hunted.
A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.
A high school senior visits college for the weekend, and stays at the wildest house on campus in this classic tale of anti-political-correctness.
A veteran detective gets stuck with a rookie cop when in pursuit of a German crook.

Somehow, Rory understands Michael, and encourages him to experience life outside the confines of home.
